name: Welcome to the Dream City
description:
Welcome to the Dream City! Take a tour in this prosperous city where people live and work happily.

While there are plenty of official information showcasing the government's success in building a world-class city, there are hidden individuals giving you a different opinion.

Let's go!

-----------------------------------

Game play: 

  • Walk with WASD or the arrow keys on your keyboard. Press two keys at once to travel diagonally, for example using both the up and right arrow to go northeast. 
  • Walk into "i" icons to open the information box.

-----------------------------------

Game art, design, coding, production:

KL852 (me)

-----------------------------------

Audio clip: 

Al Fresco by Trabant 33, available on Adobe Stock

-----------------------------------

Please share your feedback under "Comments", thank you!

This game is produced for as an assignment for my MA Computer Games Art & Design degree programme.
